attributes.action: Ensure that any MP who made fraudulent expense claims is investigated fully by the police and prosecuted if found guilty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If any member of the general public was found to be making fraudulent expense cliams they would be prosecuted.  It appears, however, that MP's seem to be above the law and this shoud not be the case. It is just not good enough just to say that they will repay the money as they have still broken the law and any normal member of the general public would not be allowed to do that and get let off.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
